com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document

Interface SpenPaintingDoc.LayerListener

  • Enclosing class:
    SpenPaintingDoc

    public static interface SpenPaintingDoc.LayerListener
    This listener interface is called when the state of a layer is changed.
    Since:
    5.0.0
    See Also:
    SpenPaintingDoc.setLayerListener(LayerListener)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int TYPE_REDO
      Layer state changed by redo command.
      static int TYPE_SET
      Layer state changed when SpenPaintingDoc.commitHistory(HistoryUpdateInfo) is called.
      static int TYPE_UNDO
      Layer state changed by undo command.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onLayerAdded(SpenPaintingDoc paintingDoc, int layerId, int type)
      Called when an layer is added.
      void onLayerRemoved(SpenPaintingDoc paintingDoc, int layerId, int type)
      Called when a layer is removed.

                  int layerId,
                  int type)
        Called when an layer is added.
        Parameters:
        paintingDoc - The PaintingDoc instance which an object is added.

        type - The change type.
